name: Coffs Windmill Motel
description:
Comfortable & affordable accommodation in Coffs Harbour. The Big Windmill Motel is all ground floor rooms and is set back from the Pacific Highway in Coffs Harbour.

The Big Windmill Motel has 41 Spacious Rooms all with Air-Conditioning, Digital TV, Foxtel &  Wireless Broadband. We have a 15 metre swimming pool with water slide, guest laundry, Free BBQ facilities, Volley ball court and our full buffet breakfast is available 6 days. There is an on-site licensed German Restaurant open 6 nights for dinner. Free onsite parking, trailer and bus parking available.

Ideally located 1.5 km  to Coffs Harbour CBD, within minutes drive the Coffs Harbour Airport, Coffs Harbour Hospital, Coffs Harbour International Stadium & Coffs Harbour Industrial Areas and just 5 km from The beach.

The Big Windmill Policies and Conditions 

- Cancellation policy: 72h before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the first night of your stay.
- Check in from 14:00 
- Check out from 10:00 
- Payment upon arrival by credit cards and cash. Please note your credit card may be pe authorised. 1.2% surcharge for Visa & Master Card. 1.8% for Amex.
- Breakfast not included.

General

- Reception Hours (Monday to Saturday): 7:00 - 21:00
- Reception Hours (Sunday and Public Holidays): 8:00 - 20:00
- No curfew.
- Excess Cleaning fee $150 applies if rooms are left requiring extra cleaning.
- For the comfort of all guests please note our rooms are non-smoking (non-compliance will incur a heavy penalty); for the convenience of guests who do smoke we have provided outdoor seating and ash pots located outside the room. ALL rooms in this Motel are SMOKE FREE. SMOKING in the unit WILL result in a fee of $400. 
- On arrival, guests will be required to provide an imprint of a valid credit card OR a cash deposit to cover any incidental charges. Photo ID may be required on check-in.
- The number of guests must not exceed the number stated on the Booking Confirmation. Each person occupying the room must be accounted for at the time of booking or subsequently agreed to either verbally, in writing or via email. Failure to declare all persons prior to check-in will result in additional charges.
- Damages, breakages, theft and losses are the guestsâ€™ responsibility during their stay.
- We have allocated pet-friendly rooms (pets occupying non-pet rooms will incur a heavy penalty); please contact us if you are unsure about your booking and we will endeavor to accommodate your needs.
- If you are arriving after 9pm please call us on the day of arrival to make arrangements for your late key pick up. 
- For the enjoyment of all guests noise restrictions do apply after 9pm. Excessive noise is not tolerated and eviction will be at Managements discretion.
- The Restaurant is open for dinner only from 5.30pm / 6 nights per week (excl. Sundays and Public Holidays).
